alert.note: Alert for Eastern Douglas County Foothills (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 5:08PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Douglas County through 530 PM PDT... At 507 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Steamboat, or 29 miles southwest of Oakridge, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Scaredman Recreation Site, Steamboat, Boulder Flat Recreation Site, Soda Springs Reservoir, Horseshoe Bend Campground and Eagle Rock Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
